champ.champInfo:
The general management of the organization and conduct of the competition is carried out by the NGO Sports Club "Asket", the Lviv Regional Kyokushin-Kan Karate-Do Federation and the Department of Culture, Youth and Sports of Zhovkiv City Council. The responsibility for the preparation and direct holding of the competition rests with the Lviv Regional Federation of Kyokushin-kan Karate-do and the Chief Jury appointed for this competition.

Organizing committee and judges:

  • Chief judge of the competition: Sempai Bohdan Golub (1 Dan)
  • Supreme observer of the competition: judge of the international category, Representative (Branch Chief) of the International Kyokushin-kan Karate-do Organization in Ukraine, President of the Lviv Regional Federation of Kyokushin-kan karate-do shihan Chungin M.P. (5 Dan)
  • Technical support — Tatarchenko I.Yu. (Lviv)

Venue of the competition: Zhovkva, Voiniv UPA street, 22.

Competition program

February 24 (Saturday):

  • 08:00-09:00 registration of competition participants, weighing of athletes, mandate and medical commission
  • 09:00-09:30 judges meeting
  • 09:30-10:00 ceremonial opening of the competition
  • 10:00-14:00 preliminary matches
  • 14:00-19:00 final matches
  • 19:00-20:00 end of competition, awarding of prize winners

Competition rules.

  • The national teams of city and regional Kyokushin-kan karate federations of Ukraine, individual clubs and other clubs that develop Kyokushin karate in Ukraine take part in the competition.
  • Judges – official referee uniform according to the WFKK Rules of Competition (white shirt, black pants, blue bowtie for the side judge, burgundy for the referee, personal whistle)
  • Trainers - only in sports clothes, light changeable shoes
  • Representatives - civilian clothes (suit, tie required)
  • Competitions are held in the "Kumite" section according to the Olympic system, according to the Kyokushin-kan karate rules approved by the Ministry of Family, Youth and Sports of Ukraine in 2004.
  • Competition judging is conducted in accordance with the standards and rules of the Kyokushin-kan International Karate Organization. The composition of the team: the number of participants in each age and weight category is not limited, a coach-representative and a judge are mandatory.
  • In case of insufficient number of competition participants, presence of different levels and qualifications of athletes in a weight category or other reasons, for the purpose of high-quality and safe conduct of the competition, the organizers of the competition have the right to make the following changes:
    • combine some weight and age categories
    • introduce new weight and age categories
    • hold competitions in appropriate weight categories according to the round robin system
  • If the athlete does not appear on the tatami after the announcement of his name within 1 minute, the athlete is considered defeated
  • Neither the organizers of the competition, nor the panel of judges, nor anyone else are responsible for accidents and bodily injuries that may occur during the matches

Financing

Financial expenses for awarding the winners and prize-winners of the competition are carried out at the expense of the culture, youth and sports department of the Zhovkiv city council (subject to the approval of the relevant program) and the Lviv regional Kyokushin-kan karate-do federation, as well as other revenues. Expenses related to travel, team travel, accommodation and meals are paid for by the traveling organization

Awards

  • Athletes who took 1-3 places are awarded with cups, medals, diplomas of the respective degrees
  • Valuable and honorable prizes from the Lviv Regional Federation of Kyokushin-kan Karate-do based on the results of the competition are awarded to athletes for the best technique and the will to win

Registration

Registration for participation in the competition takes place through a personal account until February 18, 2024. Or to the e-mail of the organizing committee with the subject of the letter "application for participation in the competition "Cup of Lviv region":

tatarchenkoiu@ukr.net or
asketkarate@gmail.com

Specialized software is used during competitions. Therefore, applications must meet the following conditions:

  • Applications are submitted only in MS Excel format. The application template can be downloaded directly from the tournament page
  • In applications, you must fill in only what is written. Do not write any additional information in the columns
  • The program itself calculates the participant's age, so you must enter the date of birth correctly
  • Distribution into one or another category occurs in such a way that the participant's weight should not exceed the upper range.That is, if you specified a weight of 25.3, then this is a -30 category, not -25

All questions regarding the submission of applications by phone. +380677887728 (Ihor Tatarchenko)

Final originals of applications for participation in competitions together with documents confirming these applications (passports, birth certificates), or personal applications of participants, necessarily certified by a physical culture dispensary, together with an insurance policy, budo passport (certificate or qualification book of an athlete) , are submitted by the official representative of the team to the mandate committee by 09.00, February 24, 2024.

Contact information of the competition organizers Holub Bohdan Romanovych, phone: +380976651572
